name: Social Pressure
description:
A satirical social media simulator about mental health and memes.

A new social media site is taking the world by storm, millions of users begin using PIXL to post about their day and communicate with friends, but your only mission is overtaking all other users by any means necessary.

  • Hundreds of randomised feed posts!
  • Make your own posts and grow your audience!
  • Upgrade your posting abilities in the shop!
  • Follow and influence in-game trends!
  • Affect your mental health by reading comments!
  • Make the general public adore you!
  • Make the general public hate your guts! Your call, really.
  • Form a cult!
  • Go insane and start hacking the accounts of those who oppose you!
  • Become a sellout and take brand deals to get filthy rich!
  • Wait, what was that about cults?
  • Original chiptune soundtrack!
  • Celebrity easter egg cameos!
  • Too many references to count!
  • Tons of in-game achievements!
